content.body: Justin Ridgewell: can you help me explain Mark's security concern from lunch? I understand it at a high level but I'm struggling to come up with a code example testing our regex

content.body: Mark is concerned with a `//# sourceMappingUrl=…` comment being detected when it’s in fact a template string: ``` `\n//# sourceMappingUrl=… ` ```
content.formatted_body: Mark is concerned with a //# sourceMappingUrl=… comment being detected when it’s in fact a template string: ` \n//# sourceMappingUrl=… `
